viralPosts.text:
I'm excited to share that Art of Fauna is nominated for the Special Jury Prize of the Deutscher Entwicklerpreis! ü•≥

Both because of its accessibility and the giving back initiative, where 20% of all proceeds are donated to nature preservation! ü¶Ü

viralPosts.text: Electronic machines that *also* produce a paper ballot are good, but using paper ballots only would make voting inaccessible to people who are blind/low vision. #CripTheVote
viralPosts.author: brassclothes.bsky.social

viralPosts.text:
Keep being loud, it works!!! 
#Disabilitysky #CripTheVote

viralPosts.text:
Please join the Democrats Abroad Disability/Seniors/Military Caucuses, for a look at the dynamics of voter engagement by people with disabilities in the 2024 elections.
September 8 at 12pm ET
www.democratsabroad.org/disability_v...
#cripthevote #disabilityawareness
